releaseNotes:
1. Added support for global masking of asset value and risk rate on the [Spot], [Margin], and [Assets] pages, protecting both privacy and security.
2. Added support for customized margin currency selection in Unified Account for more flexible trading.

Gate's brand refresh is here — fully upgraded! With a cleaner interface and smoother experience, we're redefining the way you trade. Update now and embark on your whole new crypto journey.
description:
Gate is one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, offering the widest range of digital assets available for trade.
Whether you are just starting out or a seasoned trader, Gate is an ideal choice for those seeking a secure, reliable, and easy-to-use mobile app to trade cryptocurrencies with confidence.

Download the Gate app to buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and over 3,600 other cryptocurrencies.

Over 3,600 Cryptocurrencies
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Avalanche (AVAX), Chainlink (LINK), Litecoin (LTC), and hundreds more, all in one place.

Safe, Reliable and Transparent
Gate is widely recognised as one of the most secure cryptocurrency exchanges globally. With leading security measures for logins, transactions, and withdrawals, we ensure your assets are protected at all times. Gate consistently ranks among the top for cybersecurity, as assessed by independent experts.

Features and Tools
• Price Alerts and Custom Dashboard
Track your favourite cryptocurrencies and set custom alerts. Follow market trends and manage your portfolio in real time.

• Spot Trading
Buy, sell, and swap digital assets through an intuitive interface with live pricing and fast order execution.

Earn with Gate
Refer friends and earn up to 50 percent of their trading fees through our referral programme.

About Gate
Established in 2013, Gate is a globally recognised platform for digital asset trading. We offer industry-leading security, proof of reserves, and services to over 28 million users. We operate in multiple jurisdictions and are committed to regulatory compliance wherever we do business.

Be Part of Our Global Community
X (Twitter): https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gateioglobal
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

Our services are available in selected territories based on jurisdiction.
